about_the_game:
Tame It Too! is a survival harem breeding game! Here you'll find everything you love about these genres. Every day will be a challenge, because survival is not just for show! You'll have to take care of yourself and your girlfriends, evolve, adapt to the local flora and fauna, conquer, build, learn and teach!

The story of Lee's adventures from Tame It! game, who crashed and found himself on a desert island, continues!



Now a new island awaits Lee, much bigger than the previous one, and this time it is very inhabited! Exciting adventures are waiting for you in a tropical paradise full of dangers.



A large island is available for you to explore freely. Lee can run anywhere and look under every bush! You'll encounter both small animals that you can hunt on, as well as dangerous predators that can hunt you.

You will encounter both aggressive locals and meet new wild beauties that you can tame and turn into your loyal allies and lovers. But winning the hearts of the girls won't be so easy, because each one has her own character, special tastes and preferences! All the main girls have their own storylines that will help you get to know them better, overcome their fears, learn their secrets and kinks.



And where would we be without hot scenes! Interactive real-time animated spicy moments of interaction with tamed beauties! Unusual angles, interesting poses, choices of actions and, of course, the opportunity to conceive and have offspring to develop your own village! Moreover, you'll be able to breed new beauties with the appearance features you prefer, such as big breasts or a juicy ass!

Many secrets lie ahead, beautiful but dangerous monster girls to tame, new enemies, the mystery of a lost civilization, and of course the search for the kidnapped pilot girl Tonya, who is being held somewhere on the island! Start your adventure now!

Key Features


  • A big completely new island;
  • Open world to explore and conquer;
  • 3 sexy girlfriends and a lot more monster girls to tame;
  • Beautiful monster girls breeding;
  • Hot scenes with realtime animations;
  • Building and developing your own village;
  • Interesting storyline with an extensive system of quests and minigames;
  • Crafting, hunting, fishing, gathering and cooking;
  • Several endings depending on your choices.

content_descriptors.notes: In our game, you build the harem village of your dreams. Different girls like different kinks, nothing extreme, but most of them are open to breeding and pregnancy. In the game you will have to protect your girls from the attack of enemies, and also fight with wild animals that can kill you or any of the villagers.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is the sequel to the game Tame It! The adventures of Lee, who crashed and found himself on a desert island, continue! A new big island full of life and the freedom to explore it, as well as new hot beauties to tame await you in this game.
